objects.text:
• Premium 100ml/3.4 fl. oz EDT
• Elegant glass bottle with gold cap

• Long-lasting fragrance formula

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Captivating Freshness for All
product_details.description:
• Premium unisex fragrance suitable for all genders
• Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size for long-lasting use
• Eau de Toilette concentration for perfect daily wear
• Sleek turquoise bottle design with luxurious gold cap
• Fresh and invigorating scent profile
• Modern and minimalist packaging
• Perfect for daily wear and special occasions
• Professional-grade fragrance by BELLAVITA
• Travel-friendly size bottle
• Ideal gift choice for fragrance enthusiasts

banner_details:
This banner design is a clean promotional layout featuring a premium fragrance product. It uses a modern, professional design split into a left textual section and a right visual product showcase. The banner includes a bold title text layer (`heading`) in a dark, high-contrast font, followed by a stylish, cursive tagline (`tagline`) in blue that adds elegance. A detailed bullet list (`description`) describes product features in a neat, left-aligned format. The price (`price`) is bold and prominent at the bottom left. Below it, a vibrant call-to-action button (`cta_background` with text `cta`) invites user interaction. The product image (`product_image`) appears on the right side, balancing the composition.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #0079c1 (accents, tagline, CTA)
- Soft Gold: #fcaf17 (decorative curves)
- Charcoal Black: #212529 (text content and price)
- Cool Gray: #F2F2F2 (background)
- White: #ffffff (CTA text)
product_color: The product image features a vibrant, aquatic color palette that emphasizes freshness and modernity. The dominant turquoise-blue bottle (#00B7B3) embodies a clean, invigorating feel, aligning with the product’s "Fresh" identity. The text and cap are accented in a glossy, polished gold (#D4AF37), exuding sophistication and blending elegantly with the blue to give contrast and luxury without overwhelming the freshness. White (#FFFFFF) lettering complements the clean design, enhancing readability and highlighting product details. For an advertisement banner, use a gradient background—from soft aqua (#A0E7E5) to turquoise (#00B7B3)—highlighting gold accents for luxury touches, ensuring a refreshing yet premium product appeal.
